description.oldValue:
Looking for a message, but you can't remember whether it was in Teams or Outlook? Search for it in Office.com or Bing for Work and then go to the Messages Tab. You'll get both Teams and Outlook messages in the list of results. Now available in GCC and GCC-H.
GA date: March CY2023
description.newValue: Looking for a message, but you can't remember whether it was in Teams or Outlook? Search for it in Office.com or Bing for Work and then go to the Messages Tab. You'll get both Teams and Outlook messages in the list of results. Now available in GCC and GCC-H.
